database.description: The grants this User has for each Database that is owned by this Account.

items.description: Represents the level of access a restricted User has to a specific resource on the Account.

id.description: The ID of the entity this grant applies to.

label.description: __Read-only__ The current label of the entity this grant applies to, for display purposes.

permissions.description: The level of access this User has to this entity.  If `null`, this User has no access.

global.description:

If you want to pass the property `global` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/global" in the list of pointers.
